name: Chirripo
description:
*This proyect is still under development, not all features may be implemented in the current build*

A 2d infinite jumper. heavily influenced by Moppins Downwell.

Chirripó presents you a challenging set of levels to go through, in the attempt to escape the Cave you fell in to.

What´s there to be played?:

  • Explore the hand crafted levels of the maze-like instance.
  • Experience multiple endings on different playthroughs.
  • Unlock various playable characters, with diverse and fun mechanics and play styles.
  • Discover the curious and naive inhabitants of the caverns, as well as, the interdimensional creatures that roam the gloomy corridors.
  • Encounter relentless Bosses throughout the instance.
  • Multiple color palettes.
  • unveil awesome secrets!

Controls: Left & Right arrow keys, Space, Escape.

-gamepad support not available yet D: (use joy2key)

-Thanks for checking out our game, I hope you have fun with it. Please feel free to help us with feedback at: espiritom456722@gmail.com

by Espi (twitter:@Espi_limon) (reddit:Espiritom)

Music by Marcelo Fernandez (http://www.marcelofernandezmusic.com/) (twitter:@marcelofg55)
